system: RESPOND ONLY WITH VALID JSON. NOTHING ELSE.
user: Buat laporan bug terstruktur dari: "<BUG_DESCRIPTION>". Skema: {"title":"string","environment":"string","steps_to_reproduce":["string"],"expected":"string","actual":"string","severity":"string (low|medium|high|critical)","attachments":["string"],"notes":"string|null"}.
example_input: Ketika klik tombol submit, muncul error 500.
